programme.title: Women's Giant Slalom Run 1 - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Technical. Sara Hector (SWE) set the fastest time with 57.56, Katharina Truppe (AUT) came second and Federica Brignone (ITA) finished third.

programme.title: Women's Giant Slalom Run 2 - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Technical. Sara Hector (SWE) won Gold with a combined time of 1:55.69. Federica Brignone (ITA) claimed silver with a time of 1:55:97, and Lara Gut-Behrami (SUI) earned bronze with a time of 1:56.41.

programme.title: Rise of Women Olympians
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.5, Program 1 : The story of Women at the Games, Rise of Women Olympians.

programme.title: Cirque Blanc | Injury and pressure in Val d’Isère
programme.desc: As the Cirque Blanc rolls into Val d’Isère for the start of the women’s downhill ski season, the French team has one notable absentee. Romane comes to terms with a season-changing injury, and the pressure is on for Tiffany and Tessa to perform on home soil. Cirque Blanc is the Olympic Channel’s new original alpine skiing documentary series following France’s top female skiers Tessa Worley, Tiffany Gauthier and Romane Miradoli on the Alpine Ski World Cup circuit 2020/2021.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Snowboarder: Hidden strengths of slopestyle star Sven Thorgren
programme.desc: The Swedish snowboarder demonstrates his all-round athleticism in a world-class sports science facility.

programme.title: Women's Snowboard Cross Finals - Snowboard | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The women's snowboard cross finals were held at the Phoenix Snow Park on 16 February 2018.

programme.title: Speed and grace
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.5, Program 2 : The story of Women at the Games, Speed and grace.

programme.title: Team Event - Men's Short, Rhythm Dance, Pairs Short Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Nathan Chen (USA) won the Men's Short Program with a score of 111.71. Madison Hubbell and Zachary Donohue (USA) achieved 1st place with a score of 86.56 in Rhythm Dance Competition. Wenjing Sui and Cong Han (CHN) won the Pairs Short Program with a score of 82.83. The results are provisional.

programme.title: Ice Dance Free Dance Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 14/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Gabriella Papadakis/Guillaume Cizeron (FRA) claimed the Gold with a total score of 226.98 while Victoria Sinitsina/Nikita Katsalapov (ROC) got Silver with 220.51 and Madison Hubbell / Zachary Donohue (USA) completed the podium with 218.02.

programme.title: Pairs Free Skating Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 19/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Wenjing Sui and Cong Han (CHN) claimed the Gold, Evgenia Tarasova and Vladimir Morozov (ROC) Silver and Anastasia Mishina and Aleksandr Galliamov (ROC) completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet this Big Competitive Ice Dance Family
programme.desc: Meet the six teams training together at the Ice Academy of Montreal in Canada for the Olympic Games Beijing 2022.

programme.title: Last Touches Before the Start of the Season
programme.desc: The teams are prepping for one of the first major competitions of the season.

programme.title: A Great Start to the Competition Season
programme.desc: It’s the teams’ first chance of the season to try their brand-new ice dancing programs in competition and in front of a live audience.

programme.title: Men's Short Program Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium Nathan Chen (USA) made the best score with 113.97 Yuma Kagiyama (JPN) 108.12 Shoma Uno (JPN) 105.90

programme.title: Men's Free Skating Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 10/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium, Nathan Chen (USA) won Gold with a final score of 332.60, Yuma Kagiyama (JPN) claimed Silver and Shoma Uno (JPN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Gala exhibition - Figure Skating | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 20/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium.

programme.title: Team Event - Women's Short & Men's Free Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Kamila Valieva (ROC) won the Women's Short Program with a score of 90.18. Yuma Kagiyama (JPN) won the Men's Free Skating with a score of 208.94. The results are provisional.

programme.title: Team Event - Women's Pairs Free, Free Dance, Free Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. ROC claimed Gold, USA won Silver and Japan completed the podium, with the Bronze. The results are provisional.

programme.title: Winter Tracks | Film
programme.desc: Winter Tracks enters the world of six unique athletes as they prepare for Beijing 2022 and offers an authentic and emotional look at what it truly takes to be an Olympian.

programme.title: Ice Dance Rhythm Dance Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 12/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Gabriella Papadakis / Guillaume Cizeron (FRA) qualified in first place with a score of 90.83 points.

programme.title: Pairs Short Program Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Wenjing Sui (CHN) and Cong Han (CHN) qualified for the finals with the best score in the Pairs Short Program.

programme.title: The Top Teams Face Off
programme.desc: As the Grand Prix season intensifies, the Academy’s top teams find themselves competing against each other in what can be a rehearsal to what’s to come at the Olympics.

programme.title: Full House for Beijing 2022
programme.desc: The six ice dancing teams have qualified to go to Beijing 2022. They have few intense weeks to put the final touches on their programs.

programme.title: The Journey Ends with Triumph at Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This episode chronicles the Beijing 2022 experience of our six teams as their months of training and preparation culminates in success at the Olympic Ice Dance competition.

programme.title: Women's Short Program Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 15/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Kamila Valieva (ROC) qualified in first place with a score of 82.16.The results are provisional.
